p: Before challenge, calves were sedated using xylazine, 0.22 mg/kg, via the intramuscular route. Challenge was performed via the IN-route, inoculating 10,000 TCID50% of A/Argentina/2001 FMDV strain per calf, in a volume of 1 ml per nostril. The A/Argentina/2001 viral strain belongs to SENASA reference collection. As inoculum the second cattle passage of a field isolate from Trenque Lauquen, Buenos Aires province, Argentina obtained during the 2001 outbreak was used [11]. The day of challenge was defined as day 0 (0 dpi).
